high_descs: Turn right to go to the sink on the left.
Pick up the dirty rag on the left of the sink.
Go to the sink on the right.
Wash the dirty rag n the sink with running water.
Turn right to go to the bath tub.
Place the rag in the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put the washed rag into the bath tub.

high_descs: Turn right and face the sink in front of you.
Pick up the dirty towel from the sink in front of you.
Turn around in a circle and face the sink in front of you.
Wash the dirty towel in the sink in front of you and take it out.
Turn around to have the tub to your left.
Place the clean towel in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean towel in the tub.

high_descs: Turn and go to the sink on your right.
Pick up the dirty green rag on the front, left corner of the sink.
Move over to your right so that you are directly in front of the sink.
Place the rag in the sink, turn the water on, clean the rag, turn the water off, and remove the clean rag from the sink.
Turn to your right and go to the bath tub.
Place the clean rag into the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean, wet, rag in the bath tub.

high_descs: turn left and head to the sink
pick up the cloth from the sink
move right to the sink bowl
wet the cloth in the sink bowl
turn around and head to the tub
place the cloth in the tub
tasks.task_desc: place a web cloth in the tub

high_descs: move to the counter to the left of the sink
pick up a rag from the counter
move to the counter to the front of the sink
clean the rag in the sink
move to the tub to the right of you
put the rag in the tube
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned rag in the tub.

high_descs: Turn right, move to the sink that is near a silver bin.
Pick up the rag from the counter.
Move to the sink that is near the silver bin.
Put the rag in the sink, rinse it, pick it back up.
Turn right, move to the tub.
Put the rag in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean rag into the tub.

high_descs: turn right and walk towards the sink and then turn left towards the wall then turn right again towards the mirror and walk straight and look up
remove the towel from the towel holder next to the mirror

turn right then walk straight towards the shower then turn right again and walk straight towards the tub then turn left towards the sink and then turn left again at the sink then left again and look down
put the towel down on the edge of the bathtub
tasks.task_desc: pick up a towel and put it down onto the edge of the bathtub

high_descs: Turn to the right and walk until you are in front of the black vanity cabinet and stand in front of the mirror that is furthest to the left.
Remove the brown striped hand towel from the silver ring on the wall to the left of the mirror.
Turn to the right and walk until you are standing in front of the left side of the bathtub.
Place the striped hand towel into the left-hand side of the bathtub.
tasks.task_desc: Place a striped hand towel into a bathtub.

high_descs: Turn right and head to the mirror.
Take the towel off the ring on the right side of the mirror.
Turn around and head toward the tub.
Put the towel in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put the towel in the tub.

high_descs: Turn around, move to the wall, turn right to face the mirror on the wall.
Pick up the towel hanging to the left of the mirror.
Bring the towel to the tub behind you.
Put the towel in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a towel in the tub.

high_descs: Turn around completely, walk to the door, then turn right and look towards the mirror.
Take the towel off of the towel ring that is to the left of the mirror.
Turn to the right, walk to the shower door, then turn to the right and walk over to the tub.
Place the towel down in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Place a towel in the bathtub.

high_descs: turn around, walk to door, turn right to face counter
take the towel off of the towel rack on the left side
turn right, walk across the room, turn right, walk to tub
put the towel in to the tub
tasks.task_desc: move towel from towel rack to tub

high_descs: Turn around to walk towards the mirror.
Take the towel from the hanger to the left of the mirror.
Turn around to walk across the room to the bathtub.
Set the towel down in the bathtub.
tasks.task_desc: Move a towel from next to the mirror to the bathtub.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the sink in front of the mirror.
Grab the striped hand towel on the left.
Turn to your right and head towards the bath tub.
Place the hand towel on the side of the bath tub.
tasks.task_desc: To place the hand towel on the side of the tub.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the mirror.
Take the towel off of the towel holder to the left of the mirror.
Walk over to the foot of the tub.
Put the towel down inside of the tub.
tasks.task_desc: To move a towel to the tub.

high_descs: turn right and walk over to the toilet at the end of the room
grab the toilet paper off the top of the toilet there
turn around and walk over to the right side of the bathroom sink cabinet
place the toilet paper in the bottom right side of the cabinet
turn around and walk back over to the toilet
grab the toilet paper off of the toilet paper holder on the wall to the right of the toilet
turn around and walk over to the bathroom sink cabinet
place the toilet paper in the bottom right side of the cabinet

high_descs: Turn right and walk towards the toilet.
Pick up the toilet paper on the toilet.
Turn around and walk towards the vanity.
Open the right drawer below the sink and place the toilet paper in it.
Turn around and walk towards the toilet paper holder on the wall.
Take the toilet paper from the toilet paper holder.
Turn around and walk towards the vanity.
Open the right drawer below the sink and place the toilet paper in it.
tasks.task_desc: Place the toilet paper rolls in the drawer below the sink.

high_descs: Turn to the left, face the counter
Pick up the empty toilet paper tube from the counter
Turn to the right, walk across the bathroom to the other sink
Open the drawer under the sink, put empty toilet paper tube into drawer
Close the drawer under the sink, turn around
Facing the toilet, pick up the roll of toilet paper
Turn around to face the sink, open the drawer
Put the roll of toilet paper in to the drawer, close the drawer

high_descs: turn left and walk to the left side of the kitchen sink counter ahead
grab the toilet paper holder off of the counter
turn right and walk over to the other kitchen sink on the other side of the room to the right
place the toilet paper holder in a pullout drawer on the bottom left part of the sink cabinet
turn around and walk forwards to the toilet ahead
grab a toilet paper roll off of the toilet
turn around and walk to the sink cabinet ahead
place the toilet paper roll in the cabinet bottom left of the sink

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the tube next to the green rag on the counter.
Pick up the tube from the counter.
Turn right and walk to the sink next to the bathtub.
Place the tube in the left drawer below the sink then close the drawer.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Pick up the toilet paper from the back of the toilet.
Turn around and walk to the sink to the left of the bathtub.
Place the toilet paper behind the tube in the left drawer below the sink and then close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Place a tube and a toilet paper roll in the left drawer below the sink next to the bathtub.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bathroom counter left of the sink and face it
Pick up the empty toilet paper roll from the counter
Turn around walk to the small sink next to the tub
Open the left bottom drawer and place the roll inside then close it
Turn around and walk up to the toilet and face it
Pick up the full toilet paper roll from the toilet lid
Turn around and walk to the sink and face it
Open the bottom left drawer and place the roll inside then close it

high_descs: Go forward and face the sink on your left.
Take the spray bottle from the sink in front of you.
Turn left then face the can on your right.
Place the spray bottle in the can in front of you.
Turn right and face the sink on your left.
Take the spray bottle from the counter in front of you.
Turn left then face the can on your right.
Place the spray bottle in the can in front of you.
tasks.task_desc: Place the spray bottle in the can.

high_descs: Look to the ground, then turn to your right, go right again and look in front of you at the Towel holder.
Grab the towel on the holder you are looking at in front.
Look towards the ground and do a 180 degree turn, then turn to your left and go towards the big towel and trashcan in front of you.
Put the towel you are holding and place it in the trashcan in front of you.
tasks.task_desc: Put the small towel from the rack in the trashcan beside the shower

high_descs: Move to the sink.
Take the towel from the towel holder.
Bring the towel to the trash can.
Put the towel in the trash can.
tasks.task_desc: Throw out a towel in the trash can.

high_descs: Turn right and take a step then turn right and walk to the sink.
Take the towel off of the ring in front of you.
Turn around and take a step then turn left and walk to the wall.
Put the towel in the garbage.
tasks.task_desc: Put a towel in the garbage.

high_descs: Turn around, head to the sink
Take the green rag from the counter
Take a few steps to the right
Put the cloth in the sink, turn on the sink for 4 seconds
Open the drawer to the counter
Put the rag in the drawer
tasks.task_desc: Wash the green rag for 4 seconds, put the rag in the drawer

high_descs: Turn around, go to counter with sink across the room.
Pick up dirty cloth from counter.
Move to the sink on right.
Put dirty cloth in sink, turn on water, turn off water and drain.  Pick up clean cloth from sink.
Move to the left to be between sink and drawer.
Put clean cloth in second drawer down.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up dirty cloth from counter, wash cloth, put in drawer.

high_descs: Turn around and cross the room to stand at the counter to the left of the sink.
Pick the cloth up from the counter.
Move to the right and face the sink.
Put the cloth in the sink and turn the water on and then off and pick the cloth up again.
Move back and stand in front of the cabinets below the sink.
Open the bottom left drawer and put the cloth in and shut the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cloth in a drawer.

high_descs: Turn to your left and walk across the room, then turn to your right and go to the bathroom counter.
Pick up t he dirty rag to the right of the bar of soap, on the counter.
Move over to your right so that you are in front of the sink on the right.
Place the rag in the sink, turn the water on, rinse the rag out, turn the water off, and remove the rag from the sink.
Step back from the sink.
Place the rag in the second drawer under the bathroom counter.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean rag in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn left, hang a right at the toilet and walk to the vanity ahead.
Pick up the dirty green towel to the right of the bar of soap on the vanity.
Turn right and walk to the sink on the left on the vanity.
Put the towel into the sink, rinse it for a few seconds and pick it back up.
Turn around, walk towards the tub and turn around to face the drawers under the sink of the vanity.
Open the far left bottom drawer to the left of the sink, put the rinsed green towel inside and close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Place a rinsed towel in a drawer.

high_descs: Turn left and go to the counter to the left of the sink
Grab the rag off of the counter
Turn right and stop at the sink
Wash the rag in the sink and then take it out
Back up and face the drawers underneath the sink
Put the rag in the second drawer on the bottom
tasks.task_desc: Putting a clean rag in a drawer

high_descs: Take a few steps forward so the shower is on the left.
Pick up the bar of soap from the trash can on the floor.
Take a step back, and move to the right to face the counter.
Place the bar of soap in the sink and turn the water on. Turn the water off and pick up the soap.
Take the soap and go right towards the bathtub, then turn right again with the tub still on the left side.
Place the bar of soap on the edge of the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse a bar of soap and place it on the bath tub.

high_descs: Walk forward to the trash bin on the floor.
Pick up the bar of soap out of the bin.
Walk to the sink to the right.
Put the bar of soap in the sink basin, rinse it off, and take it back out.
Turn right and walk to the bath tub.
Put the bar of soap in the bath tub basin.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned bar of soap in a bath tub.

high_descs: Walk to the bin
Pick up soap from the bin
Go to the sink
Put the soap in the sink and turn on the faucet, then turn off the faucet.
Pick up the soap and walk to the tub
Put the soap in the tub
tasks.task_desc: Place soap in a tub

high_descs: turn to the left twice and take a few steps and turn to the right and go to the sink counter top
pick up the pink bar of soap
turn to the right twice and and take a few steps and turn to the right twice
put the bar of soap in the sink and turn on and run the water and turn off the water and pick up the soap
turn to the right and go to the bath tub and turn to the right
put the bar of soap in the bath tub

high_descs: Go to face the sink that is on your left, near the bathtub.
Pick up the bar of soap from the left rear corner of the sink counter.

Wash the bar of soap in the sink.
Turn right and carry the bar of soap to the bathtub.
Put the soap into the bathtub.

high_descs: Turn left and move to the sink area, with the spray bottle directly in front of you.
Pick up the bar of soap from the back of the counter, to the left of sink, behind the spray bottle.

Place the bar of soap in the sink.  Turn on the water, turn the water off and drain the sink.  Pick up the pink bar of soap.
Turn right until standing with the bath tub to your left.
Place soap in the tub, to the right of the drain, half way from the other bar of soap.
tasks.task_desc: Wash a bar of soap and place it in a bathtub.

Put the spray bottle in the bottom left drawer, then close the drawer.

high_descs: Turn left and head to the white toilet.
Pick up the white spray bottle from the top of the toilet.

open drawer and put candle inside close the drawer

pick up soap from the tub

turn around in a full circle
place candle in bottom right drawer

Move to the right and face the bottom drawer below the sink.

high_descs: Turn left to walk towards the left edge of the sink countertop.
Pick up the bottle on the counter.

Pick up the bottle to the right of the rag.
Move further back from the counter.

pick up the soap bottle that is on the counter
take two steps to the right
put the soap bottle in the drawer to the right

high_descs: Turn and go to the counter to the left of the sink.
Pick up the green wash rag that is on the counter to the left of the sink.
With the wash rag in hand turn and go to the sink.
Place the wash rag in the sink.  Turn the water on to get the wash rag wet.  Turn the water off and pick up the wash rag.
With the wash rag in hand move to your left to where the toilet paper is on the counter.
Open the drawer right under where the toilet paper is on the counter. Place the wash rag in the drawer and shut the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Get wash rag wet and put it away in drawer.

high_descs: Turn left, go to door, turn right, got to counter left of sink.

Bring the rag to the sink on the right.
Wash the rag in the sink.
Bring the cleaned rag to the drawer under the sink, to the left.

Move back and face the drawers under the counter and on the left.
Put the cloth in the bottom drawer and shut the drawer.

grab the pink bar by the sink
turn around, turn around
put the pink bar in the sink, wash the bar with water, take the pink bar out
turn around to the tub
put the pink bar in the tub

Turn around to stand at the edge of the tub closest to you while holding the soap.
Place the soap in the tub to the right of the drain.

grab a bar of soap
walk over to the kitchen sink
put the soap inside the sink and rinse it off, then pick the soap back up

high_descs: Turn right and head towards the toilet.
Pick up the bar of soap behind the candles on the toilet tank.

tasks.task_desc: Take the soap from the toilet tank, rinse it, put it in a bottom left drawer.

high_descs: Turn to the right and go to the toilet
Pick up the soap on top of the toilet tank
Turn to your right, and go to the sink in front of you
Place the soap into the sink, rinse it off, and pick it back up
Take a step back to look at the sink in front of you
Put the soap into the third bottom dresser drawer to the left
tasks.task_desc: Rinse off the soap, storing it away in the drawer

high_descs: Turn to the right, go forward, and then turn to the right to reach to toilet.
Take the bar of soap on the back of the toilet.
Turn around and go left, to the sink near the tub.
Wash the soap in the sink.
Turn around, back up, and then turn to face the sink again.
Place the soap in the left, bottom drawer beneath the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put clean soap in a drawer.

high_descs: Walk to the tub with a towel in it.
Grab the towel from the tub.
Walk to the kitchen sink on your left.
Soak the towel in the sink to clean it.
Walk back to the tub.
Place the towel in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Clean off a towel in the tub.

high_descs: go to left end of bathtub
pick up green rag from bathtub
turn left, go to sink
place green rag in sink, turn on water, pick up green rag from sink
turn around, go to bathtub to the left
place cleaned green rag in bathtub
tasks.task_desc: Place cleaned green rag in bathtub

high_descs: Turn left and walk towards the counter, then turn right and walk up to the tub.
Pick up the dirty rag out of the tub.
Walk over to the closest sink.
Clean the dirty rag in the sink then pick it back up.
Walk back over to the tub.
Put the clean rag in the tub.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean rag in the tub.
